<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shiny Button Eyes](/Feats.aspx?ID=3343) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Poppet" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=418" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 64</row>

</column>

---

You've polished your eyes to reflect the smallest details in dimmest light. You gain the [Canny Acumen](/Feats.aspx?ID=764) skill feat as a bonus feat, but you must choose Perception. Additionally, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Perception checks against [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163) [illusions](/Traits.aspx?ID=92).
name: Shiny Button Eyes
